Posts.Content: Hi catlover. Your situation sounds similar to mine a bit. I noticed my nipple looking different over xmas, tried to get a walk in appointment to get things started but like you were told, they can’t refer. So I went first thing on the 2/01 to my GP who found a lump and has referred me straight up and my appointment is Tuesday. I’m dreading it but glad everything’s happened so fast. It’s definitely only been there for a short time. I’m also youngish (34), with no family history of BC, a good (extremely healthy) lifestyle and I’ve had cysts before (not in my boobs) so I’m hoping things go in my favour. Nevertheless it’s an extremely worrying time.Â  I really hope things work out ok for you. xx
Posts.Title: Worried about breast lump I’m beside myself with worry
